fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - If dead, Protect a player, giving them Powerful defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this is rolled, the player will secretly get another role, but will convert to Guardian Angel on death.
- Will appear as the alive role when dying or in investigations.
- Cannot use the ability 2 nights in a row.
- If a target is attacked but protected, they will know they were protected by a Guardian Angel.
